Event.EventArg: Excerpt from the Sage Veluna's 'Natural History of Omeras', Vol.6
Once the orc hordes had exceeded a certain size, they began
to engage in systematic raids in search of weapons, food,
Consequently, these massive hordes began to divide themselves
into tribes, each consisting of orcs related to one another
Eventually, the many rival orc chieftains, patriarchs and
warlords gathered in the southwestern regions of the southern
continent and formed their own country, to be ruled by the
one they called the Orc King…
